website_summaries.verdict: If you can afford its high price, you'll be pleased by the Logitech VX Nano Cordless Laser Mouse's comfort, features, and extremely portable design.
pros: Two modes for the scroll wheel let you spin through long documents quickly
the Logitech VX Nano laser mouse is shaped for both left- and right-handed users
tiny receiver stores inside the mouse
laser tracking for precision on many surfaces
cons: may be too small for people with large hands

customer_reviews.title: Killer portable mouse, WAY better than BT
customer_reviews.text: I tried (and own) 3 highly-rated Bluetooth mice with my 17" PowerBook and recently my 17" MacBookPro. All had frustrating "jumpy, unpredictable cursor" too often. Then I got a USB Logitech VX Revolution for home use and LOVED it. So got a VX Nano for portable use...it's FABULOUS! Both these wireless USB mice connect instantly and there is NO connection instability during use (as long as USB transmitter has reasonable line-of-sight to the mouse). The scroll wheel works well in both modes. Sideways scrolling is good (altho I like the Apple Mighty Mouse 360deg ball better). Overall, I'd say: nice feel, good ergonomics, excellent function. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: ndez

customer_reviews.title: Would you believe I'm still using this thing 8 years later?
customer_reviews.text: It's a workhorse and I'm very happy to own it. This is my daily driver at home and it works on a mousepad, a tabletop, my couch cushion, wherever. Good range, too - I've had it up to five feet away with no issues. Love the tiny receiver! My only gripe if I had one is that it tends to chew through rechargeable batteries a little faster than I'd prefer. Not that it's unreasonable by any stretch! I still get a good couple of months out of rechargeables, but I get 3-5 months from alkalines. go figure.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Moose
customer_reviews.text: Purchased: August 2008 Positives: Just leave the small USB stick in place and no problems. Wireless connection works very well. Mouse is good size for me and the small areas I often must work within. Great feature is the ability to program an action with a button on the Mouse. I have it set for desktop - get quick access to it. Deltas: The scroller seems loose and often spins through a document if I am not attentive. This is why I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars. Overall: I am pleased with it it. If you are considering this moose - I suggest evaluating the newer Logitech Mouse - Revolution?
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: Love this little mouse.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in Feb of 2008. If you would like a small, extremely lightweight mouse that responds lightening-fast to the merest touch, the Logitech VX Nano is worth every penny. Give yourself a couple days to adjust "your" touch, as it really does respond instantly. Though advertised primarily for notebooks, I use mine at my desktop, where I do most of my work (and play), and my hand never gets fatigued anymore. With use at least six days a week, my cheap batteries are lasting six weeks and two days. I would highly recommend this mouse, especially for women, but also for younger children with little hands.
customer_reviews.author: Phantom309

customer_reviews.title: Mighty Mouse!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got 2 of these, for my husband and I both. We both have laptops and this mouse is awesome. I had a wired smaller laser mouse before, but the Logitech Nano is a lot nicer ergonomically. We use the laptops mainly as desktop PC, but we both like the size, the fact that you can turn it off to save the batteries, and should we go mobile, we can leave the receiver plugged in. What I liked the best: plug the receiver in, add 2 AAA batteries, turn the mouse on and you're in business!! Even a total neophyte like me (nano techology!) can do it!!! So far so good, if it changes, I'll be back to update!
customer_reviews.author: SpyderwomanTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great mouse for traveling...or if you have small hands
customer_reviews.text: I love all of the features of this mouse, especially the tiny usb receiver and "almost frictionless" scroll wheel mode. It would be perfect if I needed a dedicated mouse strictly for traveling and was very short on luggage space. However, I prefer a mouse that's a bit larger, that I can cup my hand over. I have medium size hands. Since the Nano is also designed to be ambidexterous, it's also a bit less ergonomic than one specifically designed for right handers (of left handers, if those are available). I'm exchanging the Nano for the VX Revolution, which is a bit larger, but still small enough for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Mikes

customer_reviews.title: One sweet mouse
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a total joy to use, not only because it performs flawlessly, but because it is such a handsome design in every respect. The attention to details paid by its designers--color, texture, finish, and ergonomics should land them awards for industrial design, and land it in the Museum of Modern Art. One other review had given me pause by saying that it was too small for large hands, but there have been no issues whatsoever with my large right hand using it daily for maybe on average, 3-4 hours. Its compactness remains nothing but a virtue in my experience. Thank you, Logitech for a phenomenal addition to the world.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Dustrude

customer_reviews.title: Great portable mouse, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, 6 months later, the original batteries are still working. This mouse gets daily use by the way. The Nano receiver is simply awesome. Just plug it in and forget it. Has great range, tested it from 15 feet away. Very smooth tracking, very responsive, heavy duty solid metal scroll wheel that can ratchet or free spin. Comes with decent software. Logitech continues to raise the bar. If your mobile and you live with your notebook, this is the mouse that will allow you to ditch that annoying touch pad. Decent ergonomics, but it is a tad small, but it supposed to be portable.
customer_reviews.author: SAMIAM

customer_reviews.title: Trusty customizable mouse
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, this mouse has been my trusty mouse for some time now. It's been great using the many features it comes with, such as the ability to designate what you'd like each button to do. I've reprogrammed my mouse to go back / forward on web pages by pushing the scrolling wheel left / right. That's just one of the many features this mouse has, it's battery life is also phenomenal. I've thoroughly enjoyed this mouse for years now and felt it deserved a review.
customer_reviews.author: Sam T.

customer_reviews.title: Coolest thing since sliced bread...
customer_reviews.text: Apart from the obvious advantage of the tiny receiver which fits into a USB slot which both works very well and has amazing range, the coolest feature of this mouse is the wheel. Click the wheel and it works like most mouse wheels. Click it again and it becomes a free spinning fly wheel which allows the user to go through documents and web pages at blistering speed. I really didn't use the wheel features of mice before now but this device has changed this. For me this device represents a huge improvement over any other computer pointing device I have ever used personally.
customer_reviews.author: Dudley Creek

customer_reviews.title: Best mouse bar none.
customer_reviews.text: There are a few of things that make this mouse my favorite. 1) The IR dongle is very small, so small you can leave it plugged into your portable and it won't be damaged. 2) The ergonomics of the mouse are actually good, which IMHO is a first for Logitech. 3) It isn't huge with 100 difference and useless buttons all over it. 4) Two different modes to use the scroll wheel, bumpy and smooth. Just one caveat, if you use a Mac, don't install Logitech drivers EVER. They suck, suck, suck, Will make your mac crash because logitech can't write software to save their lives.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Woolgar

customer_reviews.title: Can't work without it
customer_reviews.text: I bought my second one in September after my first one started acting up after about 3 years of HEAVY use and I mean heavy. I am consultant and am on the road and working on my laptop constantly (24/7). God knows how many times I dropped from the armchair of my couch (over 200?) and it still functioned. It finally gave up after 3 years but I did not hesitate in paying this much for another one. Quality mouse with precision and quickness. Ergonomically well built and I say that even though I have big hands and high standards. Expensive but a WINNER!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great mouse.  Reception might be slightly weak.
customer_reviews.text: This mouse is wonderful. It's responsive, ergonomic and has very good features. The hyperscrolling wheel is a neat feature. It's nice to be able to scroll quickly through a document -- in fact, you can easily spin it too fast for your computer to handle it :). On the downside, reception might be a bit weak since I noticed that when the nano receiver is plugged in the back of my laptop away from the mouse, mouse movements are not transmitted precisely. I don't have that problem when I plug it in in the back of my laptop but closer to the mouse. I suppose the laptop screen might be creating a sufficient barrier to weaken the signal.
customer_reviews.author: Igor Pashchuk

customer_reviews.title: The best one you'll never really see again... at least not at a decent price.
customer_reviews.text: ok THIS is the mouse that I love. I just left a glowing review for another Logitech wireless nano mouse. But this is the one. Yep, the best. Too bad you can't get it anymore for the price point it originally came at. Gee... over $100? Ok, it was a great mouse, but it wasn't made of gold. It didn't make me a sammy. It did give me the love of a scroll feature I never thought I'd use and divorced me from forward/back buttons being only useable by the thumb.
customer_reviews.author: Dressi

customer_reviews.title: just what I'm looking for
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this mouse is the low profile nano USB receiver. It sticks out only 1/4" as opposed to the 1-1/2" that all of us are used to. It's one less thing to lose because I can leave it in my laptop when I pack up. Its one less thing to plug in when I set up. The logitech software gives many performance options. The mouse is medium sized compared to a desk top model, but doesn't bother my large hands. Nicest features: auto shut-off to save on batteries, and two buttons to toggle foreward or backwards through web pages without having to point and click. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Chemnitz

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mouse just about everyday for more than a month, and I love it! It feels good, the scroll wheel is awesome, tracking is great, etc. I use it for general use, audio/video editing, World of Warcraft, and it has met and surpassed my expectations! It is so convenient to leave the USB transceiver in all the time since it is so small. Battery power is amazing too.. says I still have at least 156 DAYS before the original batteries wear out! Logitech did a wonderful job with this mouse! Excellent investment if ya got the money!
customer_reviews.author: Z. K.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted and more
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking at this latest version of the Logitech wireless mouse for Laptops for some time and this one is awesome in every respect including the fact that the USB dongle fits inside (when removed for storage) the mouse and you have to open the little cover hiding it! Well designed, well engineered; great job Logitech! Update August 2013: The mouse did not last even though it was treated well. It burned through batteries 2 every month. And when it died, Logitech refused to replace it, they said it was "out of Warranty."
customer_reviews.author: BBFlash

customer_reviews.title: Logitech VX Nano Cordless Laser Mouse
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is an excellent wireless mouse. It's pointing is fast and accurate on all surfaces. I haven't owned it long, but the battery life seems good. The on-off switch is a little small, and there is no place to store the wireless antenna on the mouse body, as I've seen on other wireless mice. I also miss the ability to customize the center wheel into a "one-push-double-click" button. The antenna provided is very small and out-of-the way. It worked perfectly plugged into a USB-2 port on my desktop computer also.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ives

customer_reviews.title: May well be the perfect mouse.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well in my hand. Tracks smoothly at any speed. Can set pointer motion very high, tracking is still smooth. Hyper-scroll is a thrill. I can get to the top to the bottom of a long document in a hurry... Or to precisely 7/10ths, say. I use it a lot. Nano-sized receiver is also extremely handy. I can leave it in all the time, even when I throw my laptop into the bag. Good battery life. The "middle" button placement took a bit of getting used to, but I can live with it. Yes, I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Faster (as in Intermittent)

customer_reviews.title: awesome mouse
customer_reviews.text: perfect size. not too big or small. usb receiver is smallest i've seen and there's no fear of it breaking off sticking out the side of the computer. includes extender cable and usb port for desktop use. storage for receiver inside mouse is nice feature. on/off switch on bottom of mouse is great. no big red light on bottom like typical optical mouse. invisible "laser". power on led on top of unit. left/right scroll a nice feature. may not have the highest dpi, but quite usable and friendly. extra programmable buttons. overall, great value.
customer_reviews.author: phil7782.

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool Mouse
customer_reviews.text: This mouse is fantastic! It is very stylish looking, small but not too small. I found it via one of my customer's blogs and he absolutely raved about it. This is the only wireless mouse that has ever worked for me the way you would expect. Super precise and smooth maneuvering. There is a definite coolness factor...very convenient to have a small usb dingy which can be left in your laptop all the time. At least 5 of my colleagues are going to purchase this after seeing mine. I love it so much I plan to buy one to use with my desktop too.
customer_reviews.author: ValryianSteel

customer_reviews.title: Best mouse ever during the time
customer_reviews.text: I came to this review to indicate that my mouse has last 12 years of use and I'm still glad to have bought it. It seems like the logitech brand has it all. I'm very glad to have use this product without complain and I recommend it till this days (no bluetooth, no recharging internal batteries)
customer_reviews.author: LuisDX

customer_reviews.title: Why go Blutooth
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mouse for my wife's new laptop and was researching for a blutooth mouse because I did not want a long adapter protruding from one of the USB ports. I once had a USB memory device get bent because it was using the laptop on MY LAP and it almost broke off. I found this Logitech VX Nano which has the smallest of adapters. It is just great. You can use almost any surface with this mouse. It is super sensitive and we just love it. The size is not too small but it is light as a feather. I really like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Juroths

customer_reviews.title: I found my old one from 2009 (working great - considering I forgot about it in another laptop ...
customer_reviews.text: LOL... so I went to look if I could buy another of this, I found my old one from 2009 (working great - considering I forgot about it in another laptop bag for several years...) using it on my desktop now, since my old laser desktop fatty mouse just died and remembered I had this one someplace. Anyway the price gouging is disgusting when I saw that here, I paid $54.
customer_reviews.author: D G

customer_reviews.title: Very good mouse. Works Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the orginal mouse for my laptop. It works great. The distance you can have the mouse from the recieve is unreal compared to first wireless models. The comfort is great. Scrolling options and search options you can enter into the programming is great. You have to have the software installed for the more advanced mouse features but that isn't an issue at all. Great item. I even purchased one this year as a gift for my dad. He loves it. It doesn't burn through batteries like the first wireless ones did.
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Mouse
customer_reviews.text: Great for a think pad with the short stick. I have heard people say that they have broken one off when moving the lap top and forgot to remove the stick. With this mouse you can put the stick in the PC and forget it. The mouse is very finite in its movements, it takes some getting used to if you are used to the old cord mouse. Once you get used to it, it is very fast. It is the right size for a small hand, a person with a big hand might find it difficult to use. I would buy another one for other lap tops.
customer_reviews.author: Hot Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Mouse Droppings
customer_reviews.text: In terms of ease of operation and convenience this mouse is this cat's choice. The 'Nano receiver' is reason enough to consider it: plug it and leave it, it's just one less thing to concern yourself with when setting up or storing your laptop. I cannot use a touch pad and this is the next best thing. The only down side may be the reliability; My last one s#!t the bed after only 8-12 months. But I just bought two replacements from Amazon (I have a habit of maintaining 'backups' for most everything.
customer_reviews.author: Shwami

customer_reviews.title: not really worth it
customer_reviews.text: a lot of gloss and shine. not what i expected out of it. the two buttons for forward and back near the left click button are too small to be of any practical use. the low profile of this mouse is also a bit hard to get used to. these two reasons are the biggest dissapointment for me. it is as good as any other laser mouse and i would suggest you choose a basic notebook mouse next time. preferably the new microsoft blue.. that works on almost any surface. the features are not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Great Mouse
customer_reviews.text: Best mouse I have used. Ar $29.95 after rebate on top of a Black Friday deal, this was well worth it. It takes some getting used to the smaller size but feels great after a day or too. My only concern is the flat silver paint might eventually wear out. My other Logitech mouse is an MX-3 or LX-3 and has the glossy silver paint but even with 24x7 usage it has not work one bit. Would I pay almost $60 for this mouse? Questionable. But at $29.95 after rebate and free shipping its a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Price to Value Consumer

customer_reviews.title: The best and most practical mouse that I had.
customer_reviews.text: The first mouse of this model I bought the year 2008. This is my second order, the first mouse took my son and I left without him, the Mouse, in Europe, I could not find it again, and now after all this time I bought it on Amazon. Personally for me the best and most practical mouse that I had. Very functional, laser fantastic, working in all sorts of surfaces, very accurate and fits nicely in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: GAMADEUS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Travel Mouse - Annoying Clicking Sound
customer_reviews.text: An excellent, well-built mouse for travel. Works on a lot of different surfaces. I find it too small for daily, regular use. (Personally favor the size/shape of the Microsoft Bluetooth Intellimouse.) Deciding factor was the size of the USB receiver. Didn't install the accompanying Logitech software. Most buttons and the scroll wheel operate under Windows 7. Find the clicking sound when the right/left buttons pressed a little annoying, especially in quiet areas. Long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: GoAMZN

customer_reviews.title: A Solid Performer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to augment my notebook when I have space for a mouse. My only complaint with this model is that the storage slot for the USB antenna is in the battery compartment. I would have preferred a slot on the exterior. *Edit* Passed the 3-year mark using this mouse and it is still going strong. I need to replace the battery about every 5 months, but otherwise I am impressed with the continuing performance. I have brought the rating back up to 5-stars.
customer_reviews.author: Live Free

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Mouse Ever
customer_reviews.text: This mouse is by far the best device to navigate your PC with. I have always been a trackball type of guy, but decided that I needed something a little smaller and wireless. It's small enough for travel, but not too small for a mouse; it fits well in the hand. With it's almost nonexistent USB wireless plug-in (that you never have to remove), quick laser movement that works well on most surfaces (except my glass desk), and the free flowing scrolling wheel, the Nano definately is an essential tool for your computer. All thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: JackOfAllTrades

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Nails it Again
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through quite a number of mice and learned long ago to stick with Logitech. I bought this mouse for a laptop that I didn't want to mess up the USB port on when I move it around. The receiver is tiny and can be left in at all times. It's straight up plug & play, although you can use Logitech's software for greater customization. I currently have it plugged into my desktop and use it (with Input Director) for both the desktop and laptop together. It works better than my gaming mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Tech User

customer_reviews.title: Very practical!
customer_reviews.text: This was a X-mas gift for my husband. I was a little reluctant to buy it after reading some of the reviews since my husband has big hands. He carries his laptop in a bag and a larger mouse would have been inconvenient and too bulky. The small USB can be left attached permanently to a port and the size of the mouse turned out to be its best asset. After installing and customizing it to his needs, he had absolutely no problem adjusting to navigating with it. This one's a keeper!!!
customer_reviews.author: Reliable Shopper

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: not a bad mouse but nothing to boost about. good for surfing the web but not for actual works that require plenty of mouse works. I in fact return to my regular cord microsoft optical mouse when massive use of clicking and gliding required. try to get use to its gliding on the table surface for a month and still have difficulty. decided to just use it at home, instead of at work. like that tiny adapter that doesn't stick out. good for travel and light use, I think.
customer_reviews.author: Trojan Horsing Around

customer_reviews.title: Pretty freaking nice !!
customer_reviews.text: amazing features and works like a charm ! Although its stated that the USB plug only sticks out 'x' amount it doesn't really go in as far as it should as you would think looking at it that it would go all the way in up to the edge of the plastic part but it doesn't. Kind of minor considering how much smaller it is compared to any other on the market. Kudos also for the zipped bag it comes with to keep it nice while transporting. overall i give this 5 stars and hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D. Costa

customer_reviews.title: Best Mouse - Especially for Left-Handed Users
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mouse I've ever had and I'm SO GLAD I bought an extra one for only $99 in case my old one stopped working. Well my old one's been doing fine and it's going on 5 years now. The best thing about this mouse is where the buttons are - THE BEST for left-handed mouse users. I'm so sad this has been discontinued by Logitech.
customer_reviews.author: Mishael53

customer_reviews.title: Eventually the wheel stops turning
customer_reviews.text: It's a great mouse; the laser can be used on almost any surface, and it feels good in my hand. I love the frictionless scroll wheel, although it has caused inadvertent selections from pull-down menus. Also, after a lot of use, the wheel doesn't spin quite as freely. But after using it in college, I took it with me to my office rather than using the standard-issue optical mouse, and I'm really glad I did! I feel more productive because of its responsiveness and the lack of a wire to get tangled with the phone line on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: This mouse broke on me less than a year in. The scroll wheel no longer works! I want to get a refund, but I'm afraid to try to go through the Logitech warranty process. Apparently, there's no online form and you have to call them. You also need to find the number on the back of the mouse, which for me has completely rubbed off by now. I love the layout and everything, it's the best laptop mouse I have ever had, but I shouldn't have to go through incredible hoops to get a scroll wheel fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great, Comfortable Mouse
customer_reviews.text: This mouse is one of the better ones that I've used. It sits very comfortably in the hand and is very accurate with its laser tracking. The tiny receiver is great! I never take it out of my laptop simply because there is no reason to take it off. Its so short that even if it did catch on something, it wouldn't break simply because there's no leverage like with the ones that stick out. Overall, I highly recommend this mouse to anyone who wants a mouse to replace their laptop's track pad.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mouse for my laptop, which I take with me a lot of places. I especially like the case that it comes with because I hate my gadgets getting scratched up. That nano adapter did not fit into all of my USB ports though, some were too shallow for it and it did not fit all the way in so it did not connect. But I switched to another port and it worked fine, no big deal. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Santoku

customer_reviews.title: Great mouse
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mouse. I was looking for something smaller that didn't stick out far on the side of my laptop. This one is so small, I can leave it in my computer all the time. The mouse can be turned off when not in use, therefore conserving battery life. I love the case the mouse comes in. It does work on virtually any surface. I have used it on my sofa, bed, and table. I love this. It is the best I've tried so far.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I also own a MX1000 mouse for my desktop and even though I like the shape and feel of the BIG ergo mouse this one rocks. I have big hands and this is just right. It is small compared to my MX1000 but it is still very comfortable to use. Great features and feels solid as well. Another great product from Logitech. Also I ordered this from Amazon and selected the free shipping. I got it 2 days later! Amazon rocks!
customer_reviews.author: skaping

customer_reviews.title: great mouse
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Love the micro usb receiver. I do prefer the feel of Microsoft mice better, but they don't have this micro receiver. Only hope that this mouse doesn't go the same way many of my other Logitech devices have gone. Bought a bluetooth mouse that all of a sudden got flakey. Had a wireless keyboard that suddenly started chewing through batteries. All my M# stuff keeps chugging along with no probs. You'll enjoy this mouse.
customer_reviews.author: K. Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Nice mouse
customer_reviews.text: Nice. I have big hands -- it could be bigger, but it is not too small for me. I bought one of those little wrist pillows (like the computer stores sell next to the mice) to rest my wrist on while using it in my home office -- that helps. Scary-small receiver and scary-long battery life. My wrestling with the unfriendly packaging caused my mouse to take a 4-foot drop to the floor upon opening -- but it seems to work fine. Overall, nice.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Dobbs

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with Logitech
customer_reviews.text: I love logitech products, never had a problem with them and always satisfied and once again this mouse has met my satisfactions. Its not too small (I have small hands anyway) but then again its not too big. What do you expect for a notebook mouse! I love the nano receiver, if it wasn't for that I wouldn't have bought it therefore if your looking for a mobile mouse for your laptop and you don't mind the small size then Grab this one you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Beckham

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Design - Great Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: What a step up from the inch long dongles that used to protrude from our laptops. This mouse has an excellent design and a great battery life. The receiver is so small it is absolutely no problem to leave it in. I was worried that it would catch on my bag as I popped it in and out, but it's rarely an issue. The batteries last several months with heavy use, and the software offers you remaining battery life in days so there are no surprises.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice Compact Mouse
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mouse because I was feeling pain in my hand due significant use of my laptop's touchpad. Reason to buy this mouse was to have that "Nano" receiver. Haven't taken out since I plugged it into my laptop. Everything works perfect. However, sometimes I feel the mouse could have been little bigger and resulted in better ergonomics. I sometimes feel the mouse is little small; apart from that the device works excellent for me.
customer_reviews.author: vik

customer_reviews.title: Great Mouse
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the small little receiver, it makes it easy to keep it plugged in even when packing away my laptop for travel. The mose works great syncs easily and is very compact w/several convenient features such as the forward and back buttons for internet browser control. I am a computer techie/geek, my wife is not and she will only use this mouse, when I replaced it once with another one, she whinned until I got this mouse back. We love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Super Great Wireless Mouse
customer_reviews.text: I loved these because the USB transmitter is low profile and can be left in my laptop all the time. The mouse is a perfect fit -- I'm an average size guy and liked the smaller mouse both for portability and also for general ergonomics. The wheel is super helpful and the tapered profile is very comfortable. I use daily for over 3 years and never had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: D. Salotti

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this Mouse!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mouse anywhere. It's compact and very portable, and it's easy to switch off if you're not going to be using it for a while. The mini USB connection is the coolest. I wish everything USB was like this! It might be a problem if you were going to take it out a lot, but it's so small you can just leave it plugged in even when you're packing your laptop around. I have three of these I like them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Glover

customer_reviews.title: Notebook Mouse - Top rated
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my earlier cordless mouse with this one. It is a lot more responsive and I can vary the controls via the included software. The freewheeling wheel is nice for fast scrolling thru a document. This worked so well that I ordered a second one for my Grandson's laptop. Only thing is that I never know if I need to turn the mouse off with the little button on the bottom or will it turn itself off automatically. ?
customer_reviews.author: Philipp2

customer_reviews.title: Nano cordless mouse
customer_reviews.text: This item is fabulous, for all those who are more comfortable using a mouse and have only a laptop computer it takes away any shortcomings of using the touch pad. The mouse works on any surface and is compact, comfortable and the plug in is barely noticable, it shuts down when not in use so you can revert to using the touch pad if you so desire. I am very glad I purchased this item. It was recommended to me by a friend who happens to use the same laptop I use so I had no queries about its compatability.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: I liked it so much ......
customer_reviews.text: I liked it so much on my laptop, that I got one for my desk top. Controls are in the best position, in my opinion. It does everything that I need. The clickless scrolling option (user selectable) is great. The nano receiver is truly tiny. Any less and it would be flush fitting in the USB port. Just enough to be able to remove it (I leave it plugged in) without needing a tool.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H

customer_reviews.title: Takes a beating
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second one (lost receiver for the first) since these don't support the unifying reciever, but you couldn't ask for a better laptop mouse, compact, comfortable, battery efficient, and durable to boot. Never a complaint with it. Current one has been in service for about 3 years, going through college, gaming, and everything else i've put it through.
customer_reviews.author: N. Munson

customer_reviews.title: Last Laser Mouse
customer_reviews.text: This will be my last laser mouse. Fits my hand perfectly; flawless operation on virtually any surface; product description was accurate. The receiver is virtually invisible and can be left in place while traveling, making this the ideal notebook mouse. I will buy more to use with all of my computers, desktops and laptops. Ease of installation and operation make this choice a no brainer. Logitech has another winner.
customer_reviews.author: Walt3bar

customer_reviews.title: Great Mouse - Great Cust. Service from Logitech
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I bought this one for my wife and she loves it too. I had one of these for almost a year when the scroll wheel started to bind up a little. Logitech sent me a new one right away. Once you get used to the free-wheeled scrolling, nothing else will seem right. If you travel with this mouse (like I do), I recommend that you cut the plastic packaging that is formed to the shape of the top of the mouse and put it in the little zipper pouch that comes with it. This will help to better protect your scroll wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Best Laptop Mouse Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Logitech VX Nano laser mouse. One reason I got this model was for the super small nano receiver. You really don't have to remove the receiver from your laptop. The hyper-scroll is pretty neat as to activate the function by clicking the middle scroll wheel down and it will change from hyper-scrolling to regular precise scrolling. The laser did not work on a black glossy surface.
customer_reviews.author: Master Q

customer_reviews.title: Small, simple, perfection
customer_reviews.text: My hands are little woman hands and this fits them, finally. Love the hidden USB compartment that turns off the battery when not in use. Easy, have had for years and only had to change the rechargeable AAA battery once! PLUS I love the soft protective zip up pouch that comes with! Best price for such an important little mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Small Wonder

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I've used this mouse for a while now and I am impressed by the precision of movements that it captures. A laser mouse is definitely the way to go over optical mice. If I had to do it again I would go with a mouse that has the Logitech unifying USB adapter for any future purchases though. Logitech is a solid brand for peripherals and having purchased multiple devices, I would recommend this brand for computer accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little mouse
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed at how small the receiver is! Never have to take it out to travel. The mouse is excellent. A little on the small side, but perfect for travelling. The scroll wheel works great in both modes and the "search" button can be easily programmed to act as the middle mouse button. I do wish the navagation buttons were on the thumb rather then the index finger, but its really not that much of a bother. All in all, I would highly recommend this mouse for laptop users! Thanks logitech for this excellent mouse!
customer_reviews.author: Verkinix

customer_reviews.title: Love the USB receiver!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the mouse for its tiny receiver - my laptop travels all over with me - on the desk, in the garage, watching TV, in bed, etc. etc. - so I don't have to worry about knocking it out of the port. But, in addition, I found the mouse to have a great "feel" and is very accurate. The only thing I don't like is the placement of the back and forward buttons; they are hard to reach -- rather, the back button should have been placed on the left side of the mouse and the forward button should have been placed on the right. Other than that, very functional and well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product that Logitech quit making!
customer_reviews.text: I got this mouse over three years ago and it lasted a full three years of daily abuse! It then pooped-out. They don't make these anymore and if a person can find it - it'd be way too expensive. I replaced it with the 'Logitech Anywhere Mouse' which is just slightly bigger than the Nano Mouse. Loved it. Sorry it died.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Marie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mouse!
customer_reviews.text: Awesomely designed mouse, loaded with with features. I have tried many wireless mice but never found one that's completely satisfying. This one does it for me...and the size of the mouse, and especially the size of the receiver...I love it. The extra features are just the cherry on the top. In the past I would always look for A4Tech first, but Logitech definitely both me with this one. It's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: G. Stankovic

customer_reviews.title: Best Travel Mouse
customer_reviews.text: The best feature is the size of the USB receiver. My last one broke when I forgot to remove and stuffed into my bag. I have had the VX Nano for a month and have traveled internationally 3 times without problems. The receiver has never been removed from my laptop - it slides in and out of my bag with ease. The mouse itself, fits nicely in the hand and has all the features you would want. There is an on / off switch to extend battery life. When switched on, the mouse is automatically recognized (within a second) and you are off to go.
customer_reviews.author: Cranky Scott

customer_reviews.title: Simply awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat small convenient mouse. I have been fiddling around with a variety of "mice" and I really liked this one. Pros: The biggest pro is the usb adapter. You can't believe how small the thing is. It is very convenient to leave it there and not worry about taking it out when you are moving. The mouse itself has most of the functionality that you would need and the two level speed scrolling option is a good add-on. Cons: None so far.
customer_reviews.author: Vijay Ramamurthy

customer_reviews.title: Great Accuracy, long battery life, awesome size for laptop
customer_reviews.text: I was considering buying a razer gaming mouse for my laptop, but then I saw the logitech vx-nano on CNET as having the editor's choice award. I'm really happy I bought it. I've had it for over a month now, and it's an excellent mouse with amazing accuracy. It works on all the surfaces that my old optical mouse wouldn't. If you're looking for a great gaming mouse or just great accuracy with a small form factor, buy this mouse.
customer_reviews.author: sm

customer_reviews.title: I'm not changing this mouse never!
customer_reviews.text: Buy it, buy it, buy it.....that's the first thing that came into my mind when I started writing this review.... It's size is perfect for the hand to rest in a comfortable position, the receiver is so small that I plugged it into the USB port of my laptop and it has been there for over two months without a single problem due to the perfect size... Recommended 100%
customer_reviews.author: Eulise R. Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line cordless notebook mouse....
customer_reviews.text: Definitely top of the line for a notebook mouse - good hand conformity and ergonomics in a small package, good reception with the mini receiver at the back of the notebook (didn't need the extension cable). Great movement and control. (Replaced an earlier model Logitech wireless notebook mouse - bought for the NANO receiver, but the movement and ergonomics were an improvement as well).
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: perfect size, tiny receiver (i really never take it out)
customer_reviews.text: i LOVE this mouse. it comes with batteries, which i thought was surprisingly thoughtful (seems no company does this nowadays, and they were good batteries too). inside the battery section of the mouse is a slot to store the tiny receiver, which also keeps the mouse from being turned on. clever. really though, the receiver is so small i never take it out of my laptop. feels nice, buttons and scroll are smooth. i highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: leefis

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product & Features
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the Logitech VX Nano and the other Amazon reviews were accurate...helped me make the decision to purchase. The build quality of the VX Nano is impressive from the piano black accents, the scroll wheel, size and shape, to the carry bag that comes with it. The mouse pointer always feels accurate with no latency - have not used for any games but will certainly give it a try (I'm not a serious gamer obviously). Two thumbs up...can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: G. Cain

customer_reviews.title: I hope the side buttons were closer
customer_reviews.text: It's very good mouse overall. The only issue for me is that the side buttons (on the left) seem to be a little tricky to use. I have small hand, though. I would be perfect if I can use my thumb to press the side buttons. Update on 1/27/2011: The previous one that I reviewed above is still functioning very well. I just bought 3 more of them from Amazon when price drops under $20. They all work well. Thank you Amazon for selling very good products with unbelievable price!
customer_reviews.author: Einstein

customer_reviews.title: Best Mouse
customer_reviews.text: This is a awesome mouse the best you can buy. It is light easy to maneuver, scrolls smoothly and love the buttons You can set them to copy and paste or to do what you want. the usb is so small you forget it is there. I love this mouse so much I bought one for my friend for a gift. I had my mouse for about a year dropped it well over 5 times and it still works great.
customer_reviews.author: L. Duci

customer_reviews.title: Plug & play in Linux
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Logitech trackballs for many years and have always found a mouse difficult to use. I was shopping for a portable wireless trackball when I found this mouse, and decided to give a try because of the laser precision. It works perfectly on a netbook that runs on Ubuntu v8.04, though I didn't try to install the software for the additional functions.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest birdwatcher

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This little mouse is great. I love not haveing to plug & unplug the little USB thing. The USB IS really small. The mouse is very light even with the batteries installed; even lighter than my plug in mouse. It fits my hand well and my husband even feels comfortable using it. The added features are nice, but I haven't mastered what does what yet. I will in time though. I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Baby Boomer 4

customer_reviews.title: Logitech VX Nano Ciordless Laser Mouse for Notebooks
customer_reviews.text: I love this mouse. I bought it to use with my laptop at home. There, I'm usually using my mouse on the edge of the brown leather recliner and my previous mouse just wasn't working very well on that surface. This mouse is great because it works great even on the dark brown leather surface, and I love that I don't have an extra wire hanging from the laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Star B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Mouse!
customer_reviews.text: I use this mouse as my travel mouse with my laptop. If I have lots of typing to do, I prefer to use a mouse than my laptop's track pad. I love that this mouse has forward and back buttons on the left side of the mouse. Can accommodate either right- or left-handed users.
customer_reviews.author: smraff

customer_reviews.title: One of the best mice I've bought.
customer_reviews.text: Bought on December 7th 2007, and used exclusively as my primary mouse for avg 10 hours per day, even till today, aug 11th 2011. Still going strong and works very well. Batteries last, no kidding, about 6months for 2-AAA sized batteries. This is one of the best things I've purchased from Logitech, and I'm a Logitech freak. Highly recommended and excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: nevery

customer_reviews.title: best laptop mouse
customer_reviews.text: This is the second vx nano i have bought. The other is in the case of my other computer at home, im very happy with the performace, and the micro receiver its a nice feature since i dont have to conect or disconect it every time im using the mouse, its accurate, it seems to work in 'all terrain' except on glass surfaces. i highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: E. D. Giralt

customer_reviews.title: I like this mouse very much, but...
customer_reviews.text: This mouse works very well for me. The dongle is small enough that I never have to take it out even when putting my laptop away into my bag. That is my favorite feature of the mouse. I suspect that the small dongle will become a standard feature across all the wireless mouse products, but for now this is the one. There is one caveat to my recommendation. The driver for this mouse is not compatible with the driver for the Logitech DiNovo Edge keyboard. This is a known issue that Logitech is apparently working to correct, but as of 12-Feb-2008 it is not yet fixed. So be aware of this issue if you use this particular wireless keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Musson

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing mouse! The receiver is really small and you can store it in the mouse in the battery compartment when travelling. Really sweet. The wheel system is also quite neat - you can scroll the usual 1 or 3 lines at a time or click on the scroll wheel and then just brush the wheel with your finger and you can scroll easily through a multi page document in no time. I own several Logitech products and most of them don't disappoint. I would recommend this product to anyone who needs a compact mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great lite duty mouse.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the mouse, and I'm tempted to purchase another one, but you have to click it gently, and if your using it on a game, that won't happen. The micro switch in under the left and right pads won't take it, but it is smooth, and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Prgrmr1

customer_reviews.title: Great Mouse!
customer_reviews.text: This mouse is great! the small usb transmitter is great for laptops. It wont get in the way of your mouse or other stuff you plug in. It has so many extra button features for a mouse. The only thing I don't like is, it eats up batteries like no other device I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: TheStr8Up

customer_reviews.title: The perfect laptop mouse/dongle
customer_reviews.text: [..] This product is perfect for my notebook computer. The dongle is so small you can leave it in the laptop USB slot all the time with no fear of hurting it or banging it etc. It was plug and play.....no installation required. The mini mouse is so small it works just fine on the armchair of my TV watching chair. I love it and would recommend it to anyone. Tony B.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MOUSE AND SPACE SAVER
customer_reviews.text: This cordless mouse has a very strong signal and tracks very well. Because the USB receiver is so tiny it barely protrudes from the computer. This is wonderful when using a laptop because not only does it take up very little desk space but I don't have to worry about accidentally knocking if off when moving the laptop around! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marsey

customer_reviews.title: Its almost 2019, good as new.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mouse for almost a decade, EVERY SINGLE DAY, it stills feel like it is new. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: JUAN C GONZALEZ

customer_reviews.title: Love the nano reciever!
customer_reviews.text: The nano reciever is great and the feel of the mouse is well sized. The travel pouch offers some protection and the wheel is frictionless, but my computer seems too slow to keep up with it. The 2.4ghz technology is far better than traditional bluetooth. I would definetly purchase this mouse again. My previous 2 mice broke from my son dropping it and they were Microsoft brand, but Logitech has great products.
customer_reviews.author: A. Imperiale Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Very fast!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very fast acting mouse. The receiver is quite small and can stay in place during transort. The case feels a little flimsy but seems to hold up well to abuse by a seven year old. We lost the battery cover and no replacements are sold, but it seems to work fine. It can take some time to get used to the spped of the response but it is not too bad. It is definitely fast than a wired mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Ray J. Zielonka

customer_reviews.title: I like the size of the unit - not too large ...
customer_reviews.text: Use it daily. I like the size of the unit - not too large or small.
customer_reviews.author: Duffer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Prduct
customer_reviews.text: The Nano transmitter is great. Good transmission and small size. The mouse feels like a high quality product, very responsive on multiple surfaces. I have not programmed the optional buttons. However, even without these options, the mouse is one of the best I have used. I will soon buy another one for my desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Goat

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic - if you need a great mouse for travel or daily use buy me!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mouse. The small connector that fits into the USB is pure genious as far as I am concerned. It never needs removed but can be if you so desire and stored in the bottom beside the batteries. The scroll wheel has two modes. One of them is almost friction free....the wee things spins on for ever.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: VX Nano
customer_reviews.text: The first really responsive mouse for notebooks I have used that performs like I expected. The size, carrying case and especially the ultra small usb receiver which allows you to leave the mouse plugged in are all additional benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Roger S.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I connected this to a windows 7 laptop. Installation was crazy fast. I've never had a problem with this mouse. It still is running on the first battery I put in it. I like that I can leave the USB connecter in because it is so small but even if I remove it it gets stored in the mouse. A great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Stoddard

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect mouse for mobile user.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a lot of mouse (kensington, microsoft) and just buy this logitech vx nano. Amazing mouse, what's a perfect that I search for a long time. I love the friction less wheel and also the 4 ways mouse. The two more button is really useful when surfing the net. Thanks to Logitech, I'm become your big fan right now. I'm planing to buy the MX revolution to test soon.
customer_reviews.author: Gayji

customer_reviews.title: Long Time Owner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mouse for my Asus Eee PC netbook two and a half years ago and it's still going strong. I can store the netbook in its zipper case with the receiver plugged in. I've never had an issue with it, and I've replaced the batteries only twice since I've had it. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Labrat

customer_reviews.title: Very good Traveling and at home
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mouse for my laptop to use at school. It exceeds my expectations for comfort [I have carpal tunnel from trackpoint] and worth the extra step to pack and unpack between classes. The USB micro receiver is so convenient, and receiver storage bay well designed, but I would ask Logitech to put a hinge on lid.
customer_reviews.author: Comfort First

customer_reviews.title: Plug and forget
customer_reviews.text: I loved the concept of plug and forget. I have broken more than one usb device because I forgot to unplug. Or I have failed to use my mouse because I misplaced or forgot the receiver. Even though the size is small for notebook usage it is not one of those tiny mice that cause hand cramps and cakes.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Nano VX Mouse
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. I used several bluetooth devices with my 12" Powerbook. All had some lag or wake from sleep issues. This infrared mouse extremely accurate and comfortable. Add SteerMouse software for a driver instead of Logitech and you will be able to use the other buttons easily. Receiver really is that tiny and can travel with laptop. Sure you lose one USB port but its so much better than bluetooth. Comes with a pouch as well. Good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Music Aficionado

customer_reviews.title: Best little mouse
customer_reviews.text: I love this mouse. It is the perfect size for a woman's hands (even hands considered big for a woman) and light, so it doesn't tire your hand hauling over your mousepad. The receiver never had any trouble, and the low profile is perfect for someone that has to pack up and move their laptop often - plug it in and forget it. The multiple buttons makes it ideal for gaming play as well. I couldn't recommend this mouse highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Marcela

product_meta.title: Logitech 910-000253 VX Nano Cordless Laser Mouse Retail
product_meta.description: Point your computer in the right direction!This Logitech VX Wireless Laser Mouse is a great upgrade from your old ball mouse. On the computer for hours on end? This laser mouse s ergonomic and ambidextrous design will make working and browsing comfortable. With its 6-buttons you ll be able to make sure your pointer is doing exactly what you want it to do. Tilt-wheel technology allows you to scroll horizontally as well as vertically. Its nano USB receiver is the world s smallest. Make your mouse always ready to go by plugging in the nano receiver to a USB port and forgetting about it. Also included is an additional USB receiver with an added USB port so you don t lose USB product access. Transport it easily with its carrying pouch and effortlessly carry it with your notebook computer. Grab this Logitech VX Wireless Laser Mouse and bring it home today!
feature_bullets: Logitech VX 6-Button Wireless Laser Mouse w/USB Hub General Features: Black color
Sleek ergonomic design with soft rubber grips 6-buttons Scroll wheel acts as third button
World's smallest USB receiver, nano-sized to store within the mouse
2.4 GHz USB nano receiver cordless technology Additional USB receiver with extra USB port

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars896 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
